description: This file defines the FlightRepository interface that extends JpaRepository to perform database operations related to FlightEntity objects, including custom query methods based on airline code, flight number, and flight date.

classes.name: FlightRepository
classes.description: Spring Data JPA repository interface for FlightEntity, providing CRUD operations and custom query methods.

methods.name: findByAirlineCodeAndFlightNumberAndFlightDate
methods.description: Finds a FlightEntity based on airline code, flight number, and flight date.

methods.name: findByFlightDate
methods.description: Retrieves a list of FlightEntity objects scheduled on a specific date.

methods.name: findByAirlineCodeAndFlightDate
methods.description: Retrieves a list of FlightEntity objects for a specific airline on a given date.
